title: English Language for GS Custom Settings plugin

strings.title: GS Custom Settings
strings.descr: A plugin for custom site, theme and plugin settings.
strings.tab_open: View only settings in this tab
strings.warn_tab_remove: This action will irrevocably delete a tab and all its settings. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
strings.warn_jsonimport_tabexists: Warning: This data-import will overwrite one or more existing tab's settings. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
strings.error_jsonimport_invalidext: Error: Invalid file extension. Import a valid JSON file.
strings.error_jsonimport_invalidbrowser: Error: Your browser does not support the JS FileAPI. You have to manually import settings.
strings.error_conflict_tabs: Error: Duplicate tab labels, modify them to avoid naming conflicts.
strings.error_conflict_settings: Error: Duplicate setting lookups in the same tab, modify them to avoid naming conflicts.
strings.error_save: Error: Data could not be saved.
strings.info_no_editing: These settings belong to a plugin and can or should not be edited.
strings.info_no_editing2: These settings belong to a theme and can or should not be edited.
strings.info_tab_remove: The settings within this tab have been moved into the first tab.
strings.warn_change_type: Changing the input type will reset this setting's value.
strings.warn_change_label: Changing the setting's tab or label requires you to update PHP calls referencing it.
strings.warn_prop_conflict: Two or more settings have the same label, modify them to avoid name resolution conflicts.
strings.warn_tab_conflict: Two or more tabs have the same label, modify them to avoid name resolution conflicts.
strings.warn_unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
